overview:
A longtime emergency room physician, Dr.Skip Freedman joined AllMed in the spring of 2000 as Associate Medical Director, and became Executive Medical Director in August 2000, purchasing the company from its previous owner. He is an accomplished entrepreneur and manager in the medical services field.

From 1989 to 2000 Dr. Freedman was the founder, President and Medical Director of Oregon Emergency Medicine Specialists, which managed the emergency departments at Tuality Community Hospital and Tuality Forest Grove Hospital and grew to over $3 million in annual revenues. Prior to that, he was Medical Director for EmCare, Inc., a Dallas, Texas-based operator of hospital emergency rooms, where he supervised 35 emergency departments with over 250 physicians in five states. Dr. Freedman is also Medical Director for Washington County Emergency Medical Services, where he directs over 90 Emergency Medical Technicians and is the physician in charge of all ambulance care.

degrees.institution: Thomas Jefferson Medical College and Yale University
